snippet: The supporters of Wu Rongrong had gone to a Beijing detention center on her behalf. One of five women’s rights activists being held, she has hepatitis.

byline.contributor: Vanessa Piao in Beijing contributed research

lead_paragraph: The supporters of Wu Rongrong had gone to a Beijing detention center on her behalf. One of five women’s rights activists being held, she has hepatitis.

headline.main: Urging Treatment for Activist in Jail in China, 16 Are Briefly Detained Themselves
headline.print_headline: Urging Treatment for Activist in Jail in China, 16 Are Briefly Detained Themselves
